items.sentence: Even though the house was surrounded by the police, the criminals managed to escape.
The bus now arriving is going to the International Terminal via Domestic Terminal 1.
Once you get a tattoo, it's like wearing the same T-shirt for the rest of your life.
At first I thought that Tom was Mary's brother, but later found out he's her cousin.
I only use pens, but I still have a pencil sharpener in my backpack for some reason.
Tom and Mary always have a lot to tell each other because they lead such full lives.
According to the newspaper, the cost of living in Tokyo is the highest in the world.
The louder the music is, the more people drink because they spend less time talking.
My car was damaged in a hit-and-run accident in a supermarket parking lot yesterday.
My grammar may not be perfect, but people seem to understand what I'm trying to say.
